meanings.definition: A type of armor for the foot, typically made of metal.
meanings.sent1: The knight's sabatons protected his feet in battle.
meanings.sent2: I polished my sabatons before the jousting tournament.
meanings.sent3: The sabatons seemed to have a mind of their own, clanking loudly with each step.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like wearing invincible sabatons, nothing could stop him.
meanings.sent5: The gleam of the sabatons under the sun was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The plural form of sabaton, referring to a type of heavy metal band.
meanings.sent1: We went to see the sabatons play live at the concert.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite song by the sabatons always gets her pumped up.
meanings.sent3: The sabatons' music was so loud, even the neighbors could hear it.
meanings.sent4: Their lyrics were like poetry wrapped in the sabatons' melodies.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the sabatons was like a thunderstorm of energy.
